Empowering sales representatives by developing a highly
usable multiplatform tablet application using the Kony platform and integrating
with Salesforce CRM backend services.

values.summary:
To create a distinct artistic identity and higher quality
animation productions in the media industry I'm collaborating with the writer,
animator and voice actor of Kud to compose, record and produce music for
several online animation series which have also been featured on dutch
television. During a 12 week music project in 2010 we have recorded and
released a limited edition officially registered audio cd.
values.title: Musician / Producer / Podcaster

values.summary:
In this large scale redesign project my team is responsible
for the deployment of a completely redesigned front-end architecture, agile
scrum workflow and internet banking application. In the current leading project
team I am developing structured modular front-end code in javascript / jQuery /
requireJS / HTML(5) / CSS(3) and supporting the leading architects in their
front-end architecture design.
values.title: Front-end developer

values.summary:
To align the concept team, business and IT in their
redesign project I have actively participated in the concept designing process,
by developing clickable prototypes in Flash Catalyst, HTML Axure and iRise that
really help to bring certain concepts to life. With these prototypes, concept
artists are able to communicate their thoughts to stakeholders like business,
management and IT which creates a great sense of involvement, overview and
participation through feedback and workshops.
values.title: Prototyper

values.summary:
Student Assistent, assisting students during computer
practicals on the courses "Inleiding Programmeren" (Java programming basics)
"Online Informatie Systemen" (Online information systems), "Project
Interactive Multimedia". and "Privacy en Beveilging" (Privacy and Security).
These jobs consist of assisting students that are performing a computer
practical course. In these courses students have to program exercises and the
studentassistents provide them help when they have questions and check their
work. In the last course I prepared and given tutorials and demo's on computer
security.
values.title: Student Assistent

values.summary:
Originating from his master study courses and the need of
educational improvement on the VU in Amsterdam, Peter and his colleague Timen
Olthof have completed several explorative researches into innovative
technologies such as Actionscript / Flex, Adobe AIR, multi touch and mobile
development for Android, resulting in clear experience documentation and
examples to be used for future student projects.

The Android development
project Peter did at the VU resulted in several small, widget based apps
resulted in one Android-Market published application called "Xbox Live Stats
Widget". This application, showing statistics for the xbox live gamer network
using the official Microsoft developers API, was engineered, designed and
implemented from scratch. In this process we have encountered several mobile
development aspects such as third party API authorization negotiations, API
usage and feed-parsing, Android Developer enrollment, Android-Market
publishing, user feedback, error reporting and version updating.

Deep-diving
into the world of mobile development resulted in a wide variety of challenges
on different levels. After learning and comprehending the complex workflow of
the Android framework, we had to deal with real end-users and used their
(mostly harsh) feedback to improve the application and create a more stable
product. 

The clear usage goal in a unique market niche, close relation to
the applications users, updates with feature requests and bug fixes caused the
application to be downloaded over 100.000 times and it is actively being used
by over 20.000 Android users (as of 01-09-11).
values.title: Innovation Specialist, Software Engineer, Developer

values.summary:
Draw electrotechnical symbols in Autocad as well as
administrating all of the ICT maintenance, like windows file server, network,
security, printers, workstation maintenance and hardware maintenance.

In the
company Tekenbureau Peerdeman I have succesfully deployed all workstations with
Windows XP with the Autocad software including the NPQ-cad solutions for
electrotechnical drawing. In this company I have also setup and maintained a
Windows file server, including seperate permissions for each employee, raid1
file mirroring and printer sharing.

When clients of Tekenbureau Peerdeman
experience difficulties with their computersystems or networks I am able to
visit them and resolve the problems.
values.title: Electrotechnical Drawer / ICT Administrator

values.summary:
This serious game company from Amsterdam is developing an
interactive educational flash-based game for young children. To improve the
educational qualities of their game there was a need for an Intelligent Tutor
System (ITS) that was able to tailor the difficulty of the in-game content to
the currently playing student. During his internship he was responsible for
eliciting the system’s requirements from management, developers and
external educational experts, engineering the software architecture and
database design and conforming to previous researched ITS’s. In the final
stage of his internship he has successfully implemented the database backend
and API for the ITS which are now actively used in the latest release of the
game.
values.title: Development Intern

values.summary:
I chose to take this job because the proper informing of
pre-study students is crucial to the computer science trade. Bad informing and
bad reputation causes low enrollments in computer science studies which leads
to a big shortage on the market. This job consists of informing people on the
computer science bachelor and master on the Vrije Universiteit in Amsterdam, as
well as some presentations on schools throughout the country.
values.title: Information official / public relations official

values.recommendationText:
If you’re looking for a team player, a
online development thoughtleader, someone who gets the tasks done, and who will
motivate your entire development team: you’re looking for Peter! I hope to
work for many more decades with Peter! And I can recommend him for the most
challenging Online projects!

It’s a pleasure to work together with Peter
for the internal newsletter and in projects. He is always cheerful, enthusiast
and willing to help and learn. Besides that he has great knowledge about
different things: from mobile, technology, user experience to photography etc.
What I appreciate the most about Peter is that he is open and that he stays
close to himself.

Peter is a young and talented front end
developer with all the necessary skills to be of added value to complex and
ambitiously planned projects. On top of that Peter has a good sense of humor,
is very dedicated towards his goals and is a nice person to work with. I enjoy
working with Peter.

Peter is colleague you want in your team. He is
very enthousiastic and proud on his work. He supports other colleagues and has
a positive influence on the teamspirit. He works fast and of course he makes
errors too.

A good musician is always looking for "that"
note. "That" timing. "That" twang. Which makes for great jazz and rock 'n'
roll. 
As a guitarist Peter applies these principles to web development.
Sites/pages do get "that" little extra, which make it rock.
He learns very
quick; I did see him go from junior to senior within months. All this with a
great smile, total dedication and the passion of a musician. And the dedication
and the passion of a true developer.

As a user experience designer it is a pleasure
to collaborate with a developer who picks up exactly what you wish to achieve
and brings in his own ideas to give an interface that vital extra umph. Very
smart, cheerful and open for challenges you couldn't ask for more from a
colleague. Added fun extras include hair that reflects his mood and slick
photos portraits of the team.

Peter has proven that he is able to make the
impossible, possible. Ambituous, innovative, professional and persistant in a
very pleasant way. And above all, Peter has made his brand by demonstrating for
an enormous audience that he is able to excel and perform in ultimate stress
situations!

Thanks for the great (team) work!

Peter is one of our most excentric, passionate
and creative consultants within the Online domain within Capgemini (leading
company within the Online space in Europe). Peter is always in a good mood,
willing to deliver, willing to learn and his hart on the right place. I'm very
happy that i've worked on several successes with Peter and think he's one of
our raising stars within Capgemini. With compliments, Yvo Booisma Domain Lead
Online Capgemini.

Peter combines exceptional technical skills and
knowledge with a perfectionist drive for quality and unique social leadership.
He is always looking to optimize workflow and communication as a means to
improve (team) results, and is constantly looking to help others.
We worked
together on many projects and Peter always delivers creative solutions, quality
productions and a lot of hard work. He proved to be a great colleague, a very
kind person and a dear friend.
A creative, innovative and amoazing artist!

In his master thesis project Peter clearly took
the role of a computer scientist who is not only open to other intellectual
disciplines but also has a strong drive to contribute to the creative process,
in this case the Mijn Naam is Haas game. Also in other (multimedia) projects,
Peter showed this rare combination of enthousiasm, technological expertise and
creativity, resulting in the work that he developed with Timen Olthof, which
can be found at http://www.niftysystems.nl/. Peter also contributed to the PR
activities of the Faculty of Sciences at VU. All in all this makes him an
example student, who obtained a well-deserved "with praise" at  his
graduation ceremony. A promising talent, ready for great work!

Peter helped us a lot with making contact with
students. His enthusiasm for his education at the VU and the field of computer
science in general is very stimulating. His way of presenting material really
helped us to connect to potential new students for the university. Reliable, on
time and always willing to help made him a great colleague.

summary:
I’m a creativist. I’m passionate about cutting edge
technology, channeling my creativity through front-end development, high-five
team synergy, music and photography. I love to excite and assist the world with
beautiful applications and solutions. I’m offering my experience in
projects ranging from small multi-touch mobile mashups to large-scale corporate
web applications. What are we creating tomorrow?
